participant_1.background:
I am a fun-loving parent who enjoys playing sports with my family.
my favorite food is steak cooked well done.
i drive a ford truck.
I like to watch astronomy documentaries and read about space.
I had a quiet Christmas birthday with my family and my boyfriend.

participant_2.background:
I have a large family, and we love to go on adventures together.
I enjoy spending time with my grandchildren and sister, reading, and gardening.
I like to listen to music as a way to relax after a day of welding and working towards my goal of skydiving.
i like to arm wrestle.
i married miss usa.

content.text: Hi there! How was your Christmas?
Great! I had a quiet Christmas birthday with my family and my boyfriend. How was yours?
Mine was great too! I spent it with my family and ate a lot of good food.
I love steak, so I had a big steak dinner with my family. What's your favorite food?
I love food too! I love trying new things, but my favorite food is probably pizza.
Pizza is a classic! I love it too.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to read, play sports, and watch astronomy documentaries. What about you?
I love to spend time with my family, read, and garden. I also like to listen to music, arm wrestle, and work towards my goal of skydiving.
That's awesome! I've never been skydiving, but it sounds like a lot of fun.
It is! I'm excited to finally do it.
